document.full_text: a new report shows that having private insurance doesn't guarantee that the life-saving service you need -- like kidney dialysis, or an organ transplant -- will be covered by your plan.
document.title: what health insurance does cover, and doesn't
lines_and_colors: a new report shows that having private insurance doesn't guarantee that the life-saving service you need -- like kidney dialysis, or an organ transplant -- will be covered by your plan.
